segments.text: I notice the little girl standing there, just waiting for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, but she’s part of this whole sneaky plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like she’s the lookout, making sure their mom doesn’t catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, stretching as far as he can to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how bold they’re being right in front of their mother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring everywhere, and they don’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before or if this is their first time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing is just so risky, and I’m surprised they’re not more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like cheering them on, even though I know it’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a classic kid move, and I can’t help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR
